#cloud-config
hostname: wazo
manage_etc_hosts: true
output : { all : '| tee -a /var/log/cloud-init-output.log' }
users:
  - name: root
    lock-passwd: false
    inactive: false
    system: false
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  jenkins@jenkins
  - name: jenkins
    lock-passwd: false
    inactive: false
    system: false
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo:
      - ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  jenkins@jenkins
